cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO, cs.AI. 

The paper focuses on a computer vision problem of reconstructing a 3D scene representation from multiple synchronized cameras, which is a common topic in the computer vision community and falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also introduces strategies to accelerate the production of free-viewpoint videos, which involves graphics rendering techniques and falls under the category of computer graphics (cs.GR). The paper also mentions the use of a volumetric visual hull approach, which is a common technique in the field of multimedia (cs.MM). The paper also discusses the use of an efficient connected components labeling algorithm, which is a common technique in the field of robotics (cs.RO). Finally, the paper mentions the use of a view-dependent rendering approach, which involves machine learning techniques and falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
